sentences.en: A niminy - piminy shyness makes frankness impossible.
After she'd overcome her initial shyness, she became very friendly.
sentences.cn: 她克服了起初的羞怯之后, 变得十分友善.

sentences.en: As she got to know people better her shyness wore off.
sentences.cn: 当她开始与人们熟悉起来,她就不那么害羞了.

sentences.en: By helpful kindness the teacher broke down the new boy's shyness.
sentences.cn: 老师和蔼可亲的态度减轻了这个新来的孩子的羞怯.

sentences.en: Debilly had no Anglo-Saxon shyness about discussing money.
sentences.cn: 在谈到钱时，德比利毫无英国式的羞涩。
最终他克服了自己的羞怯。

sentences.en: He can't get over his shyness.
Her shyness condemned her to a life of loneliness.
sentences.cn: 她生性腼腆,这使得她的生活很孤独.

sentences.en: His talent was submerged by his shyness.
sentences.cn: 他的才华为其羞怯所遮覆.

sentences.en: Hung - chien understood her shyness and didn't force her.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 了解她怕生的心理,也不勉强.

sentences.en: I endured the shyness and the pain of jealousness.
sentences.cn: 我既忍受着羞怯，又忍受着嫉妒的折磨；

sentences.en: Many believe it was his shyness and insecurity which let him down.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为是他的腼腆和缺乏安全感拖了他的后腿。

sentences.en: She completely forgot her shyness in her fascination with what he was saying.
sentences.cn: 他的话使她入了迷,完全忘记了羞怯.

sentences.en: She overcompensated for her shyness by talking too much and laughing too loud.
sentences.cn: 她为了克服自己的羞怯，却说话太多，笑声太大。

sentences.en: Shyness made the girl speak in a halting manner.
sentences.cn: 因害羞那姑娘说话结结巴巴.

sentences.en: There was a hint of schoolboy shyness in his explanation.
sentences.cn: 他的解释中带有一丝学生的羞涩。

sentences.en: When my play was with thee I never questioned who thou wert. I knew nor shyness nor fear, my life was boisterous.
sentences.cn: 当我是同你做游戏的时候，我从来没有问过你是谁．我不懂得羞怯和惧怕，我的生活是热闹的．

words.tran_cn: 害羞地；羞怯地；胆怯地；小心地
